Sentencas: A two-dimensional finite element model is developed to study the reaction kinetics and heat transfer during the self-propagating high-temperature synthesis of La0.6Sr0.4MnO3, a cathode and interconnect material used in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Two-Dimensional Modeling of Self-Propagating High-Temperature Synthesis of Strontium-Doped Lanthanum Manganate

Sentencas: The activation energy of La0.6Sr0.4MnO3 formation was calculated from experimental temperature history.
Titulo: Two-Dimensional Modeling of Self-Propagating High-Temperature Synthesis of Strontium-Doped Lanthanum Manganate

Sentencas: The calculated spatial-temporal temperature profile, heat generation rate, reaction conversion, and flow pattern of surrounding gas during the reaction are reported in this work.
Titulo: Two-Dimensional Modeling of Self-Propagating High-Temperature Synthesis of Strontium-Doped Lanthanum Manganate

Sentencas: Hot spots are found at the corner near the ignition point shortly after the ignition.
Titulo: Two-Dimensional Modeling of Self-Propagating High-Temperature Synthesis of Strontium-Doped Lanthanum Manganate

Sentencas: The model provided a simple and reliable way to design a large-scale production of La0.6Sr0.4MnO3.
Titulo: Two-Dimensional Modeling of Self-Propagating High-Temperature Synthesis of Strontium-Doped Lanthanum Manganate
